titles.title: Child Abuse Accountability Act

A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to permit the garnishment of an annuity under the Civil Service Retirement System or the Federal Employees' Retirement System, if necessary to satisfy a judgement against an annuitant for physically or sexually abusing a child.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6863)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/14/1994--Introduced. Child Abuse Accountability Act - Amends Federal law regarding Federal employees' pensions to provide for the garnishment of retirement annuities of Federal employees for the enforcement of a court order for the payment of monetary damages to victims of sexual or physical abuse.
